=== Test Plan ===

'''This test plan is not supposed to be complete; use it to guide your manual testing so they dont miss big functional areas that are part in the component; also this should be used as guideline to inspire the exploratory testing which should be adapted smartly based on the real content of a MP'''

* Install or have available a recent installation of Ubuntu desktop.
* If necessary, add the stable overlay PPA to your apt sources.
* Install the `unityy8-desktop-session` package.
* (Log out and) return to the LightDM login screen.
* Select the Unity 8 session and log in.

Verify at least the following.

* The Unity 8 Dash window appears and is populated with at least a few applications and the Store.
* Applications (eg. the Ubuntu Browser) start and continue to run.
* Indicators drop down and respond.
* Mouse and keyboard work.
* The LightDM screen returns on logout.
